name: Double Disruptor Dragon
effectText: You can Tribute this card, then target 2 "Rokket" monsters in your GY with different names; Special Summon them in Defense Position. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Rapid Trigger" or "Heavy Interlock" from your Deck or GY to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Double Disruptor Dragon" once per turn.
